SEARCH
Module org.example.cab302_project
Package org.example.cab302_project

Class RecipeDAO

java.lang.Object
org.example.cab302_project.RecipeDAO
public class RecipeDAO extends Object
Data Access Object class for managing recipes and recipe ingredients in the database Provides CRUD methods to insert, retrieve, update and delete recipes and their associated ingredients

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs RecipeDAO and intializes the database connection

      public int InsertRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Inserts a new recipe into the database
      Parameters:
      recipe - The recipe object which gets used/inserted
      Returns:
      the generated ID of the newly inserted recipe, or -1 if it failed to do so

    • getAll

      public List<Recipe> getAll()
      Retrieve all recipes from the database
      Returns:
      a list of all the recipes in the database

      Parameters:

    • getIngredientsForRecipe

      public List<RecipieIngredients> getIngredientsForRecipe(int recipeId)
      Retrieves all ingredients for a specific recipe
      Parameters:
      recipeId - the ID of the recipe
      Returns:
      a list of RecipieIngredients objects representing the ingredients of the recipe

    • deleteRecipe

      public boolean deleteRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Delete a recipe from the database by its ID
      Parameters:
      recipe - the recipe object to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the recipe was deleted, otherwise false

    • deleteRecipeIngredient

      public void deleteRecipeIngredient(RecipieIngredients Ingredient)
      Delete a recipe ingredient from the database
      Parameters:
      Ingredient - the recipieIngredients object which is to be deleted

    • updateRecipeIngredient

      public boolean updateRecipeIngredient(RecipieIngredients ingredient)
      Updates a recipe's ingredient in the database
      Parameters:
      ingredient - the RecipieIngredients object contained the updated ingredient data
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient can be updated, or false otherwise
